title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5006.14 - Agent conduct
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5006.14 - Agent conduct

State Regulations
(a) Agents are
prohibited from exchanging books of instant lottery tickets. (b) Agents are prohibited from playing
instant lottery tickets using any method other than fair chance or any method
that is contrary to the principle that every ticket has an equal and random
chance of winning. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5006.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
